alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 11:22AM MST until January 04 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches, except up to 3 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph will create dangerous blowing snow which will make it difficult or impossible to keep roads passable. * WHERE...Southwest Highlands zone. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and visibilities will be greatly reduced.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
